description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Drum Kit allows you to play drums on your Xbox 360 using your either your drum controller or your standard xbox 360 controller. Chose from 50 different drum and percussion sounds and play along with tracks from your music library. there is even a metronome for practicing.
description.short: Drum Kit allows you to play drums on your Xbox 360 using your either your drum controller or your standard xbox 360 controller. Chose from 50 different drum and percussion sounds and play along with tracks from your music library. there is even a metronome for practicing.
